## createQueryParser variable

Creates a query parser to take URL as input. The creator function takes an array of parameter parser functions to be called on each string formatted parameter. Fhe first troothy returned value will be used as parsed value for string parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createQueryParser: (parameterParsers: Parser<Parameter>[]) => Parser<Parameter[]>
```
